update

mapper.select: SELECT f.TakeStock_WinOrLose_ID, f.TakeStock_Task_ID, f.FEntryID,--行号 a.MAT_NAME Material_ID,--物料 f.TakeStock_Result,--盘点结果 case when f.WinOrLose = 1 then '盘盈' else '盘亏' end WinOrLose,-- f.Difference_Count,--差异数量 case when f.FOperator = 1 then '是' else '否' end FOperator,--是否处理 case when f.IfFEntryClose = 1 then '是' else '否' end IfFEntryClose,--是否行关闭 f.FExplanation --描述 FROM MM_TakeStock_WinOrLose f left join MBASE_MAT_BASIC a on f.Material_ID = a.MAT_BASIC_ID where f.TakeStock_WinOrLose_ID = #{TakeStock_WinOrLose_ID}
